ProductInfo.Features:
4CH 1080P NVR, third-party network cameras supported, support live view/storage/playback of video at 5 Megapixels resolution, built-in 4 PoE ports, 2 SATA interfaces for 2 hard drives. Support 1 PTZ camera
Redundant recording, HDMI and VGA output at up to 1920×1080P resolution, 4-CH simultaneous playback at D1 resolution, zoom in for any area when playback. HDD quota and group management, different capacity can be assigned to different channel
Intuitive graphic user interface, quick research, easy backup, lowest bandwidth use, NAS and IP-SAN support
Live view and playback on smart phones, FREE iPad/iPad2/iPhone/Blackberry/Android App available
Searching record files by events (alarm input/motion detection). Dual system design ensures high reliability and stability. 3-year warranty
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech 4 Channel 1080P Network Video Recorder with 1 TB Hard Drive Pre-installed, 4 Built-in PoE Ports, Live View/Playback on Smartphones, Support PTZ Cameras
